name: Tire(d)
description:
The engine I am using (FlowlabIO) Sometimes glitches out with sound when playing online, download is recommended

This is the program speaking, here are the controls 
SPACE - Start game/Stop Car 
A & D / Arrow Keys - Steer the car left and right 
ESC - Fullscreen mode (Download Only)

Here are the difficulty options 
BABY - 1 Tire per 0.5 secs 
NORMAL - 1 Tire per 0.3 secs (This is also the game speed for the "EXTRA" modes) 
NOT BAD, KID - 1 Tire per 0.2 secs (This does make a diffirence compare to normal) 
HACKER - 1 Tire per 0.1 secs (This is really hard) 

Here are the Extra Game Modes 
Impossible - This is the "Hacker" Difficulty but the tires bounce for 1.5 Secs and then disappear, this is really hard 
CHARGE - This is a mode where you also need to keep an eye out for your cars charge, and collect batteries, each battery fills out a 4th of your charge 
BOUNCE - a sort of "Easy mode" version of Impossible mode, where the tires bounce but there are way less tires on the screen
